questions.text: 1) Which of the following best describes your current workplace?

answers.text: a) State education agency
b) Local education agency or school district (including local charter network)
c) K-12 school
d) Higher education institution
e) Nonprofit organization
f) For-profit organization
g) Government agency
h) Other
i) I dont know
j) Other (please specify)

questions.text: 2a) Which of the following best describes your role? Please select all that apply.

answers.text: Superintendent or district leader
Principal or school administrator
School or district clinician (i.e. counselor, psychologist, social worker)
School or district wellness coordinator
Technology or curriculum director
Classroom teacher
Parent or caregiver
Student
Other (please specify)

questions.text: 2b) Which of the following best describes your role? Please select all that apply.

answers.text: Parent or caregiver
Organizational Leader
Researcher
Other (please specify)

questions.text: 3a) Which of the following responsibilities are mostly closely aligned with your role and purview? Please select all that apply.

answers.text: I make recommendations for mental health/well-being solutions to be adopted by schools in my jurisdiction
I make final purchasing decisions for mental health/well-being solution adoption for schools in my jurisdiction
I am a primary contact point for stakeholder engagement of schools in my jurisdiction
I am responsible for the implementation and/or oversight of mental health/well-being solutions for schools in my jurisdiction
None of the above

questions.text: 3b) Which of the following responsibilities are mostly closely aligned with your role and purview? Please select all that apply.

answers.text: I make recommendations for mental health/well-being solutions to be adopted by schools in my jurisdiction
I make final purchasing decisions for mental health/well-being solution adoption for schools in my jurisdiction
I am a primary contact point for stakeholder engagement of schools in my jurisdiction
I work directly with students on a regular or daily basis
I am responsible for the implementation and/or oversight of mental health/well-being solutions for schools in my jurisdiction
None of the above

questions.text: 3c) Which of the following responsibilities are mostly closely aligned with your role and purview? Please select all that apply.

answers.text: I make recommendations for mental health/well-being solutions to be adopted by schools in my jurisdiction
I make final purchasing decisions for mental health/well-being solution adoption for schools in my jurisdiction
I am a primary contact point for stakeholder engagement of schools in my jurisdiction
I work directly with students on a regular or daily basis
I am responsible for the implementation and/or oversight of mental health/well-being solutions for schools in my jurisdiction
None of the above

questions.text: 4) What brings you here today? Please select all that apply.

answers.text: I want to better understand mental health needs of students in my school(s), district, or broader education community
I want guidance on which stakeholder groups or entities to involve in the decision-making process for adopting new digital well-being solutions
I want advice for how to choose the right mental health solution for my school(s), district, or broader education community
I want advice on how to source funding for the adoption of a digital well-being solution
I want guidance on implementing a mental health initiative that Ive selected for my school(s), district, or broader education community
I want support in building an assessment plan for the mental health initiatives in my school(s), district, or broader education community
I want to see examples of how other school(s)/ districts have assessed student needs for their unique contexts, engaged with stakeholders, and implemented solutions
I want to learn more about common student mental health challenges
I want to get a better sense of what kinds of digital well-being solutions are out there
Im just browsing out of curiosity; I dont have a specific need right now
Other (please specify)

questions.text: 5) Which of the following are the biggest priorities for your school, district, or broader education community right now? Please select all that apply.

answers.text: Developing of students life and character-building skills
Promoting and strengthening social and school connectedness
Equipping staff and students to improve recognition of and response to signs of distress
Ensuring student access to effective mental health treatment
My school(s), district, or education community is in the process of deciding this
Im not sure
Other (please specify)

openEndedQuestions.text: 6) What is your first and last name?
7) What is your current job title?
8) We would love to reach out with additional resources to support you on your journey. What is your preferred email?
